arrin: Wax kasta oo meel qaada oo leh cuf
curiye: Walax saafi ah oo ka samaysan hal nooc oo atamka ah
atamka: Cutubka ugu yar ee ka qaybqaadan kara falcelinta kiimikaad
xarun: Walax ka samaysan laba ama in ka badan walxood oo kiimiko ah ku xidhan yihiin
molecule: Kooxda atamka kimikal ahaan isku xidhan
isku dar ah: Isku darka laba ama in ka badan oo walxood oo aan kiimiko ahaan la isku darin
isku mid ah: Isku qas oo leh halbeeg isku mid ah oo dhan (tusaale, xal)
kala duwan: Isku qas ka kooban aan labis ahayn (tusaale, hakinta)
gobol: Foomka ay walaxdu ku jirto (adag, dareere, gaas, plasma)
adag: Xaaladda maaddada oo leh qaab iyo mug sugan
dareere: Xaaladda maaddada oo leh mug go'an laakiin aan lahayn qaab qeexan
gaas: Xaaladda arrinka oo aan lahayn qaab ama mug sugan
falcelin: Walaxda ku socota isbeddelka falcelinta kiimikada
alaabta: Walax cusub oo lagu sameeyay fal-celin kiimikaad
bond: Ku qas in atamka isku hayaan molecule ama xarun
formula kiimikaad: Habka gaagaaban ee loo matalo walaxda iyadoo la isticmaalayo calaamado iyo lambaro
xal: Isku dhafka isku midka ah ee milan (walxaha kala diri) iyo dareere (walxaha)
xooga saarid: Qadarka milanka ee lagu milmay xaddi dareere ah
aashito: Walaxda ku tabarucda hydrogen ions (H+) ee biyaha
saldhig: Walaxda aqbasha hydrogen ions (H+) ee biyaha
dhexdhexaadin: Falcelinta u dhaxaysa aashitada iyo saldhigga, samaynta milix iyo biyo
tamarta kiimikaad: Tamarta suurtagalka ah ee lagu kaydiyo curaarta kiimikada ee walaxda
